diff_hunk:
@@ -2299,6 +2299,13 @@ def pairwise_distance(x1, x2, p=2, eps=1e-6, keepdim=False):
     return torch.pairwise_distance(x1, x2, p, eps, keepdim)
 
 
+def pdist(x, p=2):
+    r"""
+    See :func:`torch.pdist` for details
+    """
+    return torch.pdist(x, p)
body: Do you mean adding a `squareform` function? It wouldn't be bad, but it probably makes more sense to add something equivalent to numpy's {triu,tril}_indices. They'll allow easy conversion and are a tad more general.
